summary: The true story of a Hawaiian princess' attempts to maintain the independence of the island against the threat of American colonization.
cast: Q'orianka Kilcher|Barry Pepper|Shaun Evans|Jimmy Yuill|Will Patton|Leo Anderson Akana|Ocean Kaowili|Kamuela Kalilikane|Kimo Kalilikane|Esmond Chung|Reupena Paopao Sheck|Keith Barry|Brian Hayes Currie|Ka'alaka'iopono Faurot|Chandler Gines|Geoff Heise|Love Hodel|Jay Lembeck|Vince Keala Lucero|Jean Simon|Laura Soller|Ned Van Zandt|Blaine Kia|Kaleo-o Kalani Kia|Joseph Winchester|Abert Kia|Greg Sardinha|Kalei Kahalewai|Arthur Akana|Isaac Sonny Kalua|Aaron Kia|Louis Kauakahi|Paisley Kanahoahoa|Henry Kaanapu|Kawai Delacruz|Kenneth Makuakane|Conan Paikrosa|Gary Aiko|Howell Mahoe Jr.|Puanani Reis-Moniz|Danette Kepaa|Randy E. title: La princesa Ka'iulani
